I have been described by others as a "thorough professional" in new products development and management who is "diligent, enthusiastic, self-directed and motivated" with "great attention to detail." Colleagues have recognized my ability in "bridging and balancing the financial concerns of the company with technical and project management needs." 
 
Colleagues have made these remarks because of the results I have been able to produce and as a result of the manner in which I went about producing them. I am an active listener and a good communicator across all organizational levels. 
I have honed my ability to identify and resolve what are perceived to be minor issues before they blossom into major problems. I have successfully infused my teams with this "Always Strive For Success" mentality that has helped achieve set goals for the project by making it clear about what is necessary versus what’s not, and make sure the people doing the work feel valued for the important things they are doing.
